-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- CARGA DIM_PRODUCTS
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [gold].[dim_products];
SELECT 
    p.[product_id],
    p.[product_name],
    c.[category_name],
    p.[launch_date],
    p.[price]
INTO [gold].[dim_products]
FROM [silver].[products] p
LEFT JOIN [silver].[category] c ON p.[category_id] = c.[category_id];

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- CARGA DIM_STORES
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [gold].[dim_stores];
SELECT 
    [store_id],
    [store_name],
    [city],
    [country],
    [opened]
INTO [gold].[dim_stores]
FROM [silver].[stores];

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- CARGA FACT_SALES
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [gold].[fact_sales];
SELECT 
    s.[sale_id],
    s.[sale_date],
    s.[store_id],
    s.[product_id],
    s.[quantity],
    w.[claim_id],
    w.[claim_date],
    ISNULL(w.[repair_status], 'SIN RECLAMO') AS [repair_status]
INTO [gold].[fact_sales]
FROM [silver].[sales] s
LEFT JOIN [silver].[warranty] w ON s.[sale_id] = w.[sale_id];

-- 1. Crear el esquema Gold si no existe
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'gold') 
BEGIN 
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [gold]') 
END

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- DIMENSION PRODUCTS (Gold)
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [gold].[dim_products];
CREATE TABLE [gold].[dim_products] (
    [product_id] VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
    [product_name] VARCHAR(200),
    [category_name] VARCHAR(100),
    [launch_date] DATE,
    [price] DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- DIMENSION STORES (Gold)
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [gold].[dim_stores];
CREATE TABLE [gold].[dim_stores] (
    [store_id] VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
    [store_name] VARCHAR(200),
    [city] VARCHAR(100),
    [country] VARCHAR(100),
    [opened] INT
);

-- ---------------------------------------------------------
-- FACT SALES (Gold)
-- ---------------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [gold].[fact_sales];
CREATE TABLE [gold].[fact_sales] (
    [sale_id] VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
    [sale_date] DATE,
    [store_id] VARCHAR(50),
    [product_id] VARCHAR(50),
    [quantity] INT,
    [claim_id] VARCHAR(50),      -- Opcional, NULL si no hay reclamo
    [claim_date] DATE,           -- Opcional, NULL si no hay reclamo
    [repair_status] VARCHAR(50)  -- 'SIN RECLAMO' por default
);

-- 1. Limpiamos la tabla Gold existente
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [gold].[fact_sales];

-- 2. Creamos la tabla con filtros anti-duplicados
WITH CleanWarranty AS (
    -- Si hay más de un reclamo para la misma venta, nos quedamos solo con el último
    SELECT *, 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY sale_id ORDER BY claim_date DESC) as rn
    FROM [silver].[warranty]
)
SELECT DISTINCT -- ← Tu seguro de vida para volver al 1,040,200
    s.[sale_id],
    s.[sale_date],
    s.[store_id],
    s.[product_id],
    s.[quantity],
    w.[claim_id],
    w.[claim_date],
    ISNULL(w.[repair_status], 'SIN RECLAMO') AS [repair_status]
INTO [gold].[fact_sales]
FROM [silver].[sales] s
LEFT JOIN CleanWarranty w ON s.[sale_id] = w.[sale_id] AND w.rn = 1;
